# week 3

## Multivariable  regression analyses.

If lots of predictors, not one.

The linear model - linear in coefficients
$$Y_i = \sum^p_{k=1}{X_{ik}\beta_j}+\epsilon_i$$

```{r example01}
n = 100
x <- rnorm(n)
x2 <- rnorm(n)
x3 <- rnorm(n)
y <- 1 + x + x2 + x3 + rnorm(n, sd = .1)
ey <- resid(lm(y ~ x2 + x3))
ex <- resid(lm(x ~ x2 + x3))
sum(ey * ex) / sum(ex ^ 2)
coef(lm(ey ~ ex - 1))
coef(lm(y ~ x + x2 + x3))
```
